video.title: Apartment 23
video.synopsis: After moving to New York, June is swindled by her roommate, Chloe. Much to Chloe's surprise, June turns the tables, and a beautiful friendship begins.

episodes.synopsis: An honest, optimistic girl from the heartland is forced to move in with a sexy, unstable New York City party girl who has the morals of a pirate.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Dating is awkward enough, but when you add Chloe into the mix, it grows tenfold, which June learns the hard way when she allows Chloe to set her up.
episodes.title: Daddy's Girl...

episodes.synopsis: June befriends a group of girls at her Pilates class who are the epitome of what Chloe detests. Meanwhile, James signs up to mentor an at-risk kid.
episodes.title: Mean Girls...

episodes.synopsis: Struggling to make ends meet, June sells her homemade jam to come up with extra cash. But Chloe gets in on the action and takes it to a new level.
episodes.title: Making Rent...

episodes.synopsis: June is devastated when she receives a wedding invitation addressed to her and her ex-fiancé, so Chloe gives June a crash course in confidence.
episodes.title: The Wedding...

episodes.synopsis: After attending a tenants' meeting, June realizes that she needs to clean up Chloe's act so that they're not branded the floozies of the building.
episodes.title: The Scarlet Neighbor...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe teaches June to "network," i.e., to go drinking in the financial district, but when Chloe lands a hot broker, she also lands June a job offer!
episodes.title: Whatever It Takes...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe encourages June to be sexually empowered and to dabble in some casual encounters. However, Chloe's own sex life catches up to her.
episodes.title: It's Just Sex...

episodes.synopsis: Luther is tasked with keeping James on a strict regimen in preparation for "Dancing with the Stars," but leave it to a jealous Chloe to sabotage it.
episodes.title: The Leak...

episodes.synopsis: Type-A June is tasked with cleaning up one of Chloe's irresponsible, half-baked ideas. Meanwhile, James lands a role in a classic body-swap movie.
episodes.title: Parent Trap...

episodes.synopsis: June is desperate to keep pace with Chloe's partying ways. Meanwhile, James loses it when he learns Dean Cain's dressing room is bigger than his.
episodes.title: Shitagi Nashi...

episodes.synopsis: James goes against Chloe's advice, succumbing to June's urging and attempting the unimaginable: a Dawson's Creek reunion!
episodes.title: A Reunion...

episodes.synopsis: When June discovers that Chloe plays elaborate Halloween "tricks" every year, June becomes consumed with stopping her before she really hurts someone.
episodes.title: Love & Monsters...

episodes.synopsis: June can't afford to fly home for Thanksgiving, so Chloe persuades June to come with her to her parents' house -- under the most awkward conditions.
episodes.title: It's a Miracle...

episodes.synopsis: June is obsessed with People's Sexiest Man Alive issue. Chloe goes to great lengths to show June that she shouldn't let others define what's sexy.
episodes.title: Sexy People...

episodes.synopsis: James is in L.A. for the premiere day of "Dancing with the Stars," while Chloe is back home taking some liberties with James's empty penthouse.
episodes.title: Bar Lies...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe drags everyone along on a weekend getaway to the Hamptons, where Chloe aims to crash the party of the year and hook up with the illusive host.
episodes.title: A Weekend in the Hamptons...

episodes.synopsis: Things go well at June's new job, and she even meets a nice co-worker, Fox Paris. Chloe warns June, though, that she shouldn't be so trusting of Fox.
episodes.title: Paris...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe's friend Teddy is in town for his annual visit, when Chloe uses psycho Teddy against all the vicious women at a big department store sale.
episodes.title: Teddy Trouble...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe's remedy for June's work stress is to slip her an herbal relaxant. But the next thing June knows, it's Tuesday and Monday is a complete blur.
episodes.title: Monday June...

episodes.synopsis: When Chloe and June end up asking the same guy out, James orchestrates various dating challenges as the girls compete to win this guy's affection.
episodes.title: Dating Games...

episodes.synopsis: Luther sets June up with James's agent's assistant, Will. The two hit it off and bond over having to deal with a crazy person in each of their lives.
episodes.title: The D...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe and James have veto power over who they each date. Yet Chloe soon finds out that James has been secretly continuing to date a girl she vetoed.
episodes.title: The Seven Year Bitch...

episodes.synopsis: Mark admits to June that he likes her, but she is unsure if she feels the same. They decide to have sex, but the result is not what they expected.
episodes.title: Using People...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe tells Benjamin that she is dating five other guys -- and is surprised when Benjamin tells her that he is also dating five other girls.
episodes.title: Ocupado...

episodes.synopsis: Chloe hires a private investigator to track down the original bitch in Apt. 23, Trish, whom Chloe has been seeking revenge on for years.
episodes.title: Original Bitch...
